The Plague::

 The plague kills bots within a year and there has yet to be a cure 
known.  The bot first starts finding regular diognostic annomilies. 
Small annomilies at first but they soon grow to be quite large 
problems.  Then the bot starts having mental circuit malfunctions. 
Ranging from minor headaches, loss of memory and ringing in the 
audio sensors to complete mental function failure. Then the bot has 
optical malfunctions.  Sees things that aren't there or sees things 
in multiples.  In the last stages, the bot starts to develope rust 
stains in the metal skin that appear as little dots. But the stains 
grow and start eating away at the metal of the bot.  Finally, the 
bot is covered in rust and has holes in the metal body which have 
been eaten away by the rust.  The rust continues to eat away at the 
bot's metal body both inside and out untill complete system shut 
down and spark failure. It is spread by a small Rust NanoInsectaCon.
 The Rust Nano InsectoCon feeds off the rust particles created by 
the Rust itself.  If one of these bots bites another regular bot, 
there is a 75% chance that the bot bitten will be infected.  There 
is no cure for the plague. The plague affects bots as well as metal 
objests like ships and pods.  Any metal object can potentially be 
infected. But for somereason, the plague will affect bots before 
other metal objects.
